aws:ec2/getVpc:getVpc.description:
`aws.ec2.Vpc` provides details about a specific VPC.

This resource can prove useful when a module accepts a vpc id as
an input variable and needs to, for example, determine the CIDR block of that
VPC.

inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getVpc.

state.description:
The current state of the desired VPC.
Can be either `"pending"` or `"available"`.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getVpc.
